description:
Reality seems constantly within reach, yet it can never truly be grasped...

Discover truths and falsehoods alike as you travel with Alice and Tenniel, experiencing eight brand-new stylish and upbeat songs along the way.

This is DLC for the base game Arcaea. No progression in the base game is required beforehand—you will have access to several songs from this DLC right away, and be able to unlock others as soon as you like! In addition, all content is permanent once purchased.

Songs included in this pack:
- "Eccentric Tale" by Yamajet
- "Alice à la mode" by Masanori Akita
- "Alice's Suitcase" by Endorfin.
- "Jump" by Rasmus Faber
- "Felis" by M2U
- "Beside You" by 江口孝宏
- "Heart Jackin'" by Yu_Asahina
- "To: Alice Lidell" by モリモリあつし

Partners included in this pack:
- Alice & Tenniel (with story)
name: Ephemeral Page Pack
